effects.summary: Rapid consecutive shots (under 2s apart) gain +5% draw speed and +5% damage stacking three times.
Bonuses become +8% draw speed/+8% damage stacking four times; max stack releases a gust dealing 1 heart knockback damage.
Bonuses reach +12% draw speed/+10% damage stacking five times; max stack adds a 0.5s slow to hit targets.
